stories.text:
Zapier is a great tool, but for what it does for Facebook and TikTok leads, the price seems excessive.

Is there a free tool (or less expensive) way to capture the form leads from Facebook and TikTok? I feel Zapier has become a swiss-army knife product "to do all things integration" when most marketers just need it to integrate the form leads data.

Thank you.
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there a free Zapier that works with Facebook Leads and TikTok Leads?
Pascal's Wager, Medicine, and the Limits of Formal Reasoning
The Russian invasion of Ukraine will have myriad impacts on spaceflight

Largest cargo aircraft was destroyed during a Russian attack on airfield
EU countries will provide 'fighter jets' to Ukraine under Brussels funding

stories.text:
There are loads and loads of online tools for signing documents. From time to time I need to sign important things like employment contracts etc. but it's hard to find a tool that assures me the document I upload is not being saved, scanned or analyzed to get my personal data out of it.

Do you know of any such tool?

Edit: for clarification, I mean manual signing, like with a pen, on PDF or similar documents (not digital signing)
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you know any tool for signing documents that assures privacy?

stories.text:
Get ready to be bombarded with links :)

I'm a sixteen-year-old from Vermont. Yes, Vermont exists. I got a job programming, but the project died, and I was left looking for a new job which is pretty difficult without a GED or full-time working capability. Someone recommended I check out the Tweag open-source fellowship and come up with an application, so I started writing one. What I came up with was Fluidity, as described in the documents below. I don’t have a huge background in blockchain technology or writing interpreters, so I was hoping anybody sufficiently interested might be able to look over the technology and tell me what I’m overlooking or how foolish the idea is. I promise you it’s at least a little bit interesting.

Application: https://boards.greenhouse.io/tweag/jobs/4638654002#app

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/bradly-ovitt-49185a22b/ Overview: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1O8yd5adg0WQAV7osLUQMzMD0uL-DzWMDBRwgzKSDOGU/edit?usp=sharing Qualifications: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1zWo8vgl-vF-2Eo_roj5ahYvNtb4dQS0M0S-A4uQMxCE/edit?usp=sharing Annexe: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1DMMIpaE1-PNlJpLoeTovJi5O8SqP0PzRfr7YARalAVw/edit?usp=sharing
stories.title: Fluidity: Scripting for Blockchain
